item.title: jQuery Tutorial
item.description: jQuery Get Started Downloading jQuery <head> <script src="jquery-3.3.1.min.js"></script> </head> jQuery CDN <head> <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/3.3.1/jquery.min.js"></script> </head> <head> <script src="https://ajax.aspnetcdn.com/ajax/jQuery/jquery-3.3.1.min.js"></script> </head> jQuery Syntax Basic syntax is: $(selector).action() // Examples: $(this).hide() // hides the current element. $("p").hide() // hides all <p> elements. $(".test").hide() // hides all elements with class="test". $("#test").hide() // hides the element with id="test". $(document).ready(function(){ // all jQuery methods inside a document ready event to prevent // any jQuery code from
